short_summary: National Master Standing Offer (NMSO) for the supply and delivery of Prescription Safety Eyewear.
description: The contract requires the supplier to provide eye protection for employees with adequate safety eyewear.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement: Prescription Safety Eyewear

### Summary of Request
Canada seeks a National Master Standing Offer (NMSO) to supply and deliver Prescription Safety Eyewear to Authorized Users on an as-needed basis. The purpose of this requirement is to protect employees from eye injuries by providing adequate eye protection.

### Key Details

*   **Amendment Number**: 2
*   **Publication Date**: 2022-12-14
*   **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-02-07T14:00:00
*   **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2023-01-31

### Tender Description
The Canadian government invites tenders for the supply and delivery of Prescription Safety Eyewear. The successful supplier will be required to maintain a National Master Standing Offer (NMSO) with Canada's Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC).

### Notes
Please note that the closing time for submitting bids has been updated, and all required supporting documentation and the bid submission should be submitted no later than 2023-02-07 at 14:00:00. Bids received after this time will not be considered.

### Evaluation Criteria
The selection criteria to evaluate bids will include a combination of the above mentioned methods.

### Note re: Trade Agreements
Canada adheres to various trade agreements, including the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA) and the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA).

### Contact Information
If you have any questions or require additional information, please contact Lisa Golab (PSPC/SPAC) at lisa.golab@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

### Notice URL
For more information, please refer to the official tender notice on the Ariba Discovery platform: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14897600?extsite=MTQ4OTc2MDBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
